title_of_questionnaire.description: unique identifier of the corresponding questionnaire

answered_question_id_list.description: Array of answered question IDs, in order of answering

viewingTimeBegin.description: Point in time when the questionnaire begins to be viewable

viewingTimeEnd.description: Point in time when the questionnaire stops to be viewable

editTime.description: Duration which determines the max. answering time

answerTime.description: Point in time when questionnaire was answered

anwers_to_questions.description: Array of answers, in order of answered_question_id_list

_type.description: The number corresponding to the type: (0) regular text, (1) number, (2) point, (3) free text

number.description: If answer is represented by number, e.g. a percentage

point.description: If answer is represented by a point (x,y)
